title: Run POC: Test 10 predictors + FF portfolios with 1000 simulations
notes: Part 1 (Linear Regression) completed: 9 predictors, 1000 simulations. Beta most sensitive (range=0.0102). Results in results/tables/linear_sensitivity_poc.csv

title: Run Fama-Macbeth tests with 1000 simulations
notes: FM analysis completed with 1000 simulations. Results: Size t-stat range=0.00, Value t-stat range=0.01. Surprisingly LOW sensitivity - opposite of expectation. Adding noise to RF doesn't affect cross-sectional relationship in FM.
